problem_text_cn: 如图,在⊙O,直径AB⊥弦CD于E点,⊙O半径等于5cm,OE=3cm,则CD的值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, at ⊙O, the diameter AB ⊥ chord CD at point E, the radius of ⊙O is equal to N_0, OE = N_1, then the value of CD is ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:连结OC,如图,∵直径AB⊥弦CD,∴CE=DE,在Rt△OEC中,OE=3,OC=5,∴CE=√{OC²-OE²}=4,∴CD=2CE=8cm．
raw_comment: 本题考查了垂径定理:平分弦的直径平分这条弦,并且平分弦所对的两条弧．
